feed.title: Future of the bitcoin-dev mailing list

entry.title: Future of the bitcoin-dev mailing list
entry.summary: In recent discussions among Bitcoin developers, there has been a consensus on making a transition to an alternative email service. This change is considered the most straightforward solution to current challenges faced within the communication infrastructure of the development community. The support for this move highlights the value placed on having multiple channels of discussion, which currently include platforms like IRC. The acknowledgment and agreement from various members of the community underline the importance of effective communication in the ongoing development of Bitcoin technologies.
